articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, inspected KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Unit 458 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					 The unit is comprehensively associated with the feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in leading the air force, Kim Jong Un said, giving an instruction that a room for education in the revolutionary history should be rebuilt and its airfield renewed in keeping with the requirement of the new century.
					
					 Going round the on-foot flight training ground, desktop flight training lecture room and piloting training lecture room of the unit, he learned in detail about its ongoing combat and political drills for the new year.
					
					 He stressed the need for the pilots to make a deep study of plans for takeoff and landing at not only the unit's airfield but also other unfamiliar airfields and of their geographical features.
					
					 Watching with keen interest pilots skillfully operating the computer-aided piloting training equipment, he said that it is advisable to conduct such training so often and that it is important for all the pilots to conduct effective training by making exact demands on themselves in order to well maintain the flight system in the air. And he added it is needed to further update the training equipment.
					
					 He instructed that the pilots should be well trained how to aviate in bad weather conditions and practiced in such skills through steady drills with seat and training equipment so that they can creditably discharge their combat duty in any time and even under any unfavorable situation.
					
					 The pilots also need to intensify their physical training, he said, adding he would see to it that all-round sports facilities with indoor swimming pool and stadium and outdoor facilities are built on a modern basis at every Air and Anti-Air Force division.
					
					 Then the supreme commander guided an air ambush combat drill of the unit's fighter pilots.
					
					 Watching the drill with a smile on his face, he praised the airmen for their high aviation and successful drill.
					
					 What is the key to ensuring the combat preparedness of the air force is for the pilots to acquire the high navigation, he said, stressing: All the pilots should steadily study and perfect the Juche-based air tactics, the guerilla-style war method, and make the flight drill part of their life and inveterate habit and thus prepare themselves as stalwart fighters capable of creditably discharging their combat tasks.
					
					 He met the airmen involved in the drill and congratulated them on their successful drill.
					
					 Seeing the pursuit plane No. 302, watched by leader Kim Jong Il, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that airmen and technical servicemen have managed it well. Those planes associated with the history of the great Generalissimos should be managed in a more responsible manner so that they may lead the red hawks in air combats for defence of the country when a war breaks out, he said.
					
					 Going round bedroom, mess hall, kitchen and other parts of the unit, the supreme commander took warm care of the airmen's living with paternal love.
					
					 He had a photo session with the airmen and technical servicemen, expressing belief that the pilots of the unit would make a collective innovation in their combat and political drills for the new year by intensifying the training on a regular alert, ready to make sortie immediately when the WPK Central Committee issues an order.
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang and Ri Pyong Chol, leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The 50th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Produce Many Revolutionary Films Contributing to Revolutionary Education and Class Education" was observed in the DPRK.
					 The work, published on December 8, Juche 53 (1964), indicates the themes of revolutionary films such as the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the Fatherland Liberation War and the postwar reconstruction and rehabilitation and also those for arousing the working people to a great revolutionary surge.
					
					 It also clarifies the principle to be maintained in creating revolutionary films such as an issue of properly combining the ideological value and artistry of film pieces and one of ceaselessly training film artistes in a revolutionary way and taking good care of their lives, and ways to observe it.
					
					 A meeting took place at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday to mark the anniversary.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials concerned and those in the sector of film art and creators and artistes.
					
					 Ryang Hong Ju, chief secretary of party committee of the Ministry of Culture, made a report.
					
					 He said that the ideology and theory of creating revolutionary films indicated by the President in the work fully demonstrated its validity under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that all the officials, creators and artistes in the sector of the film art should create many more famous films powerfully inspiring the general advance for opening a new period of prosperity of Songun Korea under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Mushroom Cultivation Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Mushroom Cultivation Encouraged in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Mushroom cultivation with solar energy as heat source has been encouraged in the DPRK.
					 Among the units taking the lead in the cultivation is Pyongyang University of Railways.
					
					 The university cultivates mushroom in vinyl greenhouses whose gross area is more than one hundred square meters.
					
					 A large amount of Agaricus bisporus and Pleurotus has been produced in those greenhouses, according to Min Hyon Chun, deputy president of the university. 
					
					 Many units in North Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces are directing big efforts to mushroom cultivation in vinyl greenhouses, thus making contributions to improving the diet life of people.

articles.title: Samma Mineral Water
articles.content:
Samma Mineral Water
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Mineral water in Samma-dong No. 1, Tongdaewon District, Pyongyang of the DPRK, is in high demand among citizens for its medicinal effect.
					 It is ten times higher than Okryu mineral water, one of mineral waters in Pyongyang, in iron ion content and considered to be particularly efficacious for digestive, endocrine and skin diseases.
					
					 Jon Il Nam, 73, living in Tongdaewon District, told KCNA that Samma mineral water helped him recover from duodenal ulcer.
					
					 Kim Sun Yong, 70, living in Jangchung-dong No. 2, Songyo District, said she felt relieved from pernicious anemia by taking the water from four years ago.
					
					 Kim Kyong Jun, 66, living in Songsin-dong No. 1, Sadong District, said all his family members are normally taking the water and his wife cooks dishes with it.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Haeju, December 8 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of foreign crewmen was held at Haehung 2, Cambodian-flagged ship, in Haeju Port in South Hwanghae Province on Monday on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It was attended by the captain and crewmen of the ship.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that not only the Korean people but also all other world progressives are honoring the memory of Kim Jong Il most reverently on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 They continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a distinguished leader as he made great contributions to socialism, human cause of independence and world peace and security while leading the Korean revolution for a long time.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il who was born on Mt. Paektu and grew up in the flames of the great anti-Japanese war successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause started by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a powerful and invincible party and provided an eternal foundation for the nation's prosperity.
					
					 He defended socialist Korea with his outstanding Songun politics and turned it into invincible political, ideological and military power. His exploits will shine for a long time century after century.
					
					 They stressed that the desire of Kim Jong Il for building a thriving nation is being brought into a brilliant reality by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Wisely Leads Socialist Construction in Annals of Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Wisely Leads Socialist Construction in Annals of Revolution
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il wisely led the socialist construction by making the flames of the great revolutionary upswing rage furiously to give full play to the mental power of all the service personnel and people with his outstanding wisdom and organizing ability in the annals of the revolution. 
					 He saw that the 70-day campaign was conducted, and energetically led it in Juche 63 (1974). 
					
					 Thanks to his experienced and tested leadership a heyday of prosperity was ushered in socialist construction and it was followed by the brilliant victory of the 100-day campaign to make a breakthrough in the drive for implementing the second seven-year plan ahead of schedule in 1978. 
					
					 He held a consultative meeting of senior officials of the Organizational Leadership Department and the Propaganda and Agitation Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in June 1982 and called for bringing about once again a fresh great upswing in the socialist construction just as what happened after the plenary meeting in December 1956. 
					
					 He put up the slogan "Let us create the speed of the 80s in the spirit displayed during the great Chollima upswing!" and saw to it that the workers of the then Kim Chaek Iron Works kindled the first torch of the drive for creating the speed of the 80s and the field of metal industry made a breakthrough towards bringing about a new revolutionary surge. 
					
					 He made sure that the workers of dressing plant No. 3 of the then Komdok General Mining Enterprise built it as a model in the drive for creating the speed of the 80s. He also successfully led production of the great oxygen separator and 10 000-ton press and the construction of the world's leading West Sea Barrage to bring about a great surge in the economic construction. 
					
					 In February 1988 he saw to it that 200-day campaign was launched with the noble intention to celebrate the 40th founding anniversary of the DPRK as a grand festival of great victors and gave an instruction for leading the campaign to 2 000-day campaign and 20 000-day campaign. 
					
					 He made sure that national meetings of different fields including the national meeting of farmers, the national meeting of innovators, the national meeting of activists in the building materials industry, the national meeting of activists in the filed of fishery and the national meeting of activists in the field of stockbreeding were significantly held to make the flames of great upswing rage furiously across the country. 
					
					 In January 1998 he gave field guidance to Jagang Province with a far-sighted intention to kindle the flames of fresh revolutionary upsurge in Jagang Province which was dynamically pushing forward the construction of minor hydraulic power stations. 
					
					 He saw to it that the Songgang torch rage furiously across the country, inspired by Kanggye spirit. 
					
					 Giving field guidance to the Ranam Coal-mining Machine Complex in August 2001 he took a historic initiative calling on the entire party, state and all people to advance in the new century, holding high  the torch of Ranam. 
					
					 He unrolled a grand plan to glorify 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung as a year of proud victory noteworthy in the building of a thriving nation. He visited Kangson on Dec. 24, 2008 to kindle a torch of fresh revolutionary upsurge. 
					
					 In 2009 alone he gave field guidance to more than 200 units across the country including the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and the Songjin Steel Complex making the whole country seethe with a 150-day campaign and a 100-day campaign. 
					
					 Indeed, an eternal foundation ensuring prosperity of the country and happiness of posterity was laid and a new era of the great Paektusan nation opened thanks to the devotion, efforts and heroic long journey of the prominent statesman and greatest leader who carried forward the tradition of ever-victory of the Juche revolution with the great history of great upsurge.

articles.title: Spectacular Successes Made in Construction
articles.content:
Spectacular Successes Made in Construction
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Thanks to the grandiose plan and wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea great successes have been made in the DPRK since a great advance started in construction in the new era of Juche-oriented revolution.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture" to the participants in the 1st great workshop on construction on Dec. 8, Juche 102 (2013)- it was a signpost for ushering in a new heyday of Juche-oriented architecture.
					
					 Kim Jong Un initiated the remodeling of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and visited it dozens of times, indicating specific orientation and ways to do so. 
					
					 Thanks to his intense loyalty and meticulous guidance, the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun took on a perfect appearance as a holy place of the sun.
					
					 There appeared the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the picturesque bank of the Pothong River, boasting its peculiar architectural style. The Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery was built at the foot of Mt. Sokpak and other cemeteries of fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army were newly built or reconstructed across the country.
					
					 Pyongyang turned into a magnificent modern capital city of Juche Korea and a Songun cultural hub.
					
					 The People's Theatre, modern apartment houses, Pyongyang Children's Department Store, Songyong General Restaurant and other public catering services are standing in good harmony in Mansudae area and the marvelously lighted Changjon Street vividly shows the developing Juche-based architecture.
					
					 The construction of Munsu Water Park was completed in a matter of 9 months while the construction of Mirim Riding Club was wound up in a matter of a little over 7 months. Ryugyong Health Complex made its splendid appearance in the capital.
					
					 Educators, scientists and technicians moved into the new apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology, Unha Scientists Street and Wisong Scientists Residential Quarters.
					
					 Yonphung Scientists Rest Home was built on the picturesque shore of Yonphung Lake.
					
					 The Okryu Children's Hospital and the Ryugyong Dental Hospital sprang up thanks to the inexhaustible creative energy and matchless enthusiasm of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage that appeared on the picturesque bank of the Taedong River as happy cradle and palace of children convey his fatherly loving care to posterity. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un saw to it that the workers' hostel was built splendidly at Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and took such a benevolent measure as making sure that a grand banquet was given in the newly-built hostel for workers on May Day. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Folklore Park, Breast Tumor Institute of Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, People's Open-air Ice Rink, Skate Park, Fitness Center in Thongil Street, Mansugyo Meat Shop, etc. are among the newly built structures to ensure people's cultural and emotional life and centers to serve them.
					
					 May Day Stadium, Sports Village in Chongchun Street, Yanggakdo Football Stadium and Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, etc. were remodeled under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Mangyongdae Funfair and Taesongsan Funfair were face-lifted and lots of new parks appeared to enable working people and school youth and children to spend pleasant time.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik University of Education was successfully remodeled and the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute were rebuilt on an expansion basis as required by the age of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 Soldier-builders and members of the shock brigade performed such miracle in the new century of Juche by completing in a brief span of time the construction of the Masikryong Ski Resort which would have taken more than a decade at an ordinary pace.
					
					 Songdowon International Children's Camp was remodeled as a fashionable one and a great icon of world architecture as the project was carried out on the principle of convenience and architectural beauty first. 
					
					 Yonha Power Station in Manpho, molybdenum factory of the March 5 Youth Mine, Sunchon Dock, etc were commissioned and Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Chollima Tile Factory, Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory and many other enterprises were remodeled or rebuilt on an expansion basis.
					
					 Jangchon area is taking on new looks as the days go by thanks to the devoted efforts of citizens of the capital. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will surely build on this land a highly civilized socialist nation to be envied by world people under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, great master of creation and genius of Juche-based architecture.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant Slammed
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 1155th Wednesday meeting denouncing Japan for resorting to the moves to distort history and to turn itself into a military giant.
					 At the meeting, the speakers accused the Japanese prime minister of denying the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army enforced in the past and describing it as "groundless mud-slinging" and the ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan of insisting on the repeal of the Asian Women's Foundation's appeal in which it called for admitting the past crimes and making an official apology and legal reparation. 
					
					 Japan's exercise of the right to collective self-defense is to violate its pacifist Constitution and breach the UN charter, they held.
					
					 They urged Japan to stop the acts of distorting the history and opt for honestly settling the issue of sexual slavery, though belatedly.
					
					 They demanded Japan stop at once its moves to turn it into a military giant which pose a threat to the peace and stability in Northeast Asia while crying out for the exercise of the right to collective self-defense.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Producing More Films Conducive to Revolutionary, Class Education
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Producing More Films Conducive to Revolutionary, Class Education
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 50th anniversary of the publication of the work of President Kim Il Sung "Let Us Produce Many Revolutionary Films Contributing to Revolutionary Education and Class Education". The work clarifies the unique idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on the continuous revolution and the mission and duty of the literature and art as a powerful weapon for the revolution and construction. 
					 This work serves as important guidelines to be constantly held fast to for developing the literature and art into the powerful weapon conducive to instilling the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu into the party members and other people, Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 With deep insight into the importance of educating all the service personnel and people in a revolutionary way in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche Marshal Kim Jong Un saw to it that the revolutionary education was developed onto a higher stage. 
					
					 Now the U.S. imperialists and its allies are running amuck to break the firm single-minded unity of the service personnel and people around the party and the leader and stifle Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses by posing military threat to the DPRK and by kicking up anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. 
					
					 Great is the strength of the revolutionary literature and art in the struggle to smash the moves of the enemies. 
					
					 Officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art should carry out the far-sighted idea of Kim Jong Un for bringing about a radical turn in the film production by creating masterpieces conducive to the revolutionary and class education to glorify long the validity and vitality of the great idea and theory clarified by the President in his famous work.

articles.title: Puppet Regime's Human Rights Abuses Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Regime's Human Rights Abuses Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Organizations for human rights and reunification in south Korea including the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law", the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Council of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 4 in denunciation of the human rights abuses by the south Korean puppet authorities, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. 
					 The Security Investigation Group of the puppet National Police Agency on Dec. 3 stormed the house of Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy to search his body and house. 
					
					 The fascist police took such action on charges that he praised and encouraged the north at a press conference held on the occasion of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, an event held to observe the anniversary of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, an event held to mark the 40th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 Joint Statement and in his article contributed to the Thongil News, etc. 
					
					 At the press conference Kwon said that all his activities which the police called into question were open and legal ones, adding that he called for national independence, reunification and democratization of south Korean society, human rights and vital rights of the people. 
					
					 A press release was read out at the press conference. 
					
					 It said that the present regime is making desperate efforts to eliminate the forces critical of it and bring back the era of the "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 It demanded the security authorities stop the suppression of the activist, repeal the "Security Law", release at once all the prisoners of conscience and halt the repressive campaign to bring back the era of "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Light Tower Rebuilding Protested in South Korea
articles.content:
Light Tower Rebuilding Protested in South Korea
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The Joint Measure Committee for Checking Anti-DPRK Leaflet Scattering Operation and Construction of Aegibong Light Tower of south Korea consisting of the Pastors' Council for Justice and Peace, the People's Action for Peace against War, etc. held a press conference before the Defence Ministry building on Dec. 4 in protest against the military authorities' moves to rebuild the light tower.
					 The measure committee accused the Defence Ministry of having decided  on Dec. 2 to meet the request of the General Association of Christians for rebuilding the light tower and lighting ceremony on Christmas under the pretext of "ensuring religious activities."
					
					 The measure committee demanded the Defence Ministry put an immediate halt to the rebuilding of the tower and the psychological warfare.
					
					 It declared that the religious and public organizations desirous of peace would carry on their actions, in the future, too.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Britain
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Britain
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The British Committee for Honoring the Memory of Leader Kim Jong Il issued an information bulletin on Dec. 2 on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 The bulletin edited articles of various titles illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It introduced in detail in its preface the fact that the progressive political parties and organizations of Britain organized committees for honoring the memory of Kim Jong Il and are recollecting his sacred revolutionary life and immortal exploits and are significantly holding various political and cultural events on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 In articles of various titles including "Kim Jong Il, great defender of socialism" and "Great exploits by Kim Jong Il" the bulletin enumerated the facts that Kim Jong Il who was born as the son of the guerillas grew as a revolutionary amid the flames of the anti-Japanese war and Fatherland Liberation War and successfully developed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the powerful ranks of vanguard under the monolithic guidance of the leader since he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is the great successor" said:
					
					 Looking back upon the history, the international labor movement and eastern European socialist countries suffered serious losses in the past as the causes of their preceding leaders were not properly carried forward but the Korean people perfectly settled the issue of succession to the leadership as they are led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un inherited the idea and leadership traits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il just as they are.
					
					 He wisely led the Korean people to the drive for carrying out the behests of the great Generalissimos and thus achieved great exploits in a short span of time.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was brought out in booklet by Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Nov. 25.
					 The work, published on Dec. 25, Juche 84 (1995), deals with the idea that respecting the forerunners of the revolution is the requirement of the revolution, and indicates the principled issues arising in establishing the moral trait of respecting the revolutionary forerunners and developing the relationship among people based on noble morality and sense of obligation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered Abroad
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by the Socialist Party of Romania, remembrance meeting, photo exhibition and film show by the Bangladesh Communist Party and by the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, photo exhibitions by the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria and at Pretoria Library of South Africa, and a film show by an Angolan company from Nov. 27 to Dec 1 in commemoration of the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing his undying revolutionary career and feats and wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were those showing the successes registered by soldiers and people of the DPRK in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said that the whole life of Kim Jong Il was a brilliant one of a great man dedicated to the Korean revolution and the happiness of the Korean people and to the accomplishment of the cause of world socialism and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The general secretary of the C.C., the Bangladesh Communist Party and the general secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, praised Kim Jong Il for wisely leading the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and realize national reunification through his undying Songun leadership.
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said that the Korean people have held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as their eternal leader and added luster to his feats.
					
					 The deputy general director of the Angolan company said that Kim Jong Il was a peerless patriot and a genuine people's leader who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Tajik Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Tajik Political Figure
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, issued a statement on Dec. 1 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, was an iron-willed brilliant commander who defended socialism.
					
					 He frustrated the enemies' attempts for invasion and firmly defended the country's sovereignty by developing the Korean People's Army into the invincible strong army at the end of the last century when the imperialists intensified the anti-socialist offensive against the DPRK with the collapse of socialism in various countries as a momentum.
					
					 He formulated Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and thoroughly applied it to all spheres of social life and put the national power of the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 Socialist Korea was consolidated, demonstrating its invincibility in the world as it was led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il unrolled the grandiose plan of building a thriving nation in the days of defending socialism and provided a springboard for it.
					
					 The DPRK is working miracles and innovations in all domains under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 We wish the Korean people bigger successes in their struggle for defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Traits as Great Man Lauded by Iranian and Kuwaiti Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Traits as Great Man Lauded by Iranian and Kuwaiti Figures
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Personages of Iran and Kuwait made public statements on Nov. 26 and Dec. 3 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran said that Kim Jong Il was the wisest and the most outstanding leader.   The chairman went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed undying feats on behalf of the country, nation, times and revolution with his profound idea and theory and outstanding revolutionary practices.
					
					 The Korean people and world progressives are boundlessly revering him.
					
					 I am sure that the plan of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for building a thriving nation would be successfully realized by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Abdulreda A. R. Assiri, rector of College of Social Sciences of Kuwait University, stressed that although the DPRK is a small country it turned into a political and military power which nobody dares provoke thanks to the original Songun politics set forth by Kim Jong Il. The politics also guarantees peace and security in Northeast Asia including Korean peninsula and the rest of the world, he added.
					
					 He said that the DPRK is a country centered on the popular masses in which the whole people are firmly united around the leadership, and everything serves the people.
					
					 He wished HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, good health and bigger successes in his work for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Algeria
Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the General Union of the Algerian Workers on Dec. 3.
					 Abdelmadjid Sidi Said, secretary general of the General Union of the Algerian Workers, was elected chairman of the memorial committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting for Kim Jong Il and film show from Dec. 3 to 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 458 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 458 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea inspecciono la unidad 458 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					En esta unidad estan integradas las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre las fuerzas aereas, senalo y ordeno acondicionar nuevamente la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y renovar el aeropuerto conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					Al recorrer el lugar de ejercicios aereos a pie, la sala de entrenamiento de vuelo de mesa y la sala de leccion de entrenamiento de control aereo, de la unidad, se entero detalladamente del estado de entrenamiento militar y politico del ano nuevo.
					
					Al ver el entrenamiento en el lugar de ejercicios aereos a pie dijo que los aviadores deben estudiar profundamente el proyecto de despegue y aterrizaje en el aeropuerto de la unidad y otros no acostumbrados y la topografia.
					
					Luego de ver con atencion a los pilotos que manejan con habilidad los equipos de ejercicios de control aereo por computadora subrayo que  es bueno hacer mucho tal entrenamiento e importante realizarlo sustancialmente elevando la demanda para que mantengan bien en el aire el orden de vuelo, dijo y refirio la necesidad de  modernizar mas los equipos de entrenamiento.
					
					Hay que ensenar bien a los pilotos el metodo de vuelo en las condiciones del tiempo desfavorable y adiestrarlo perfectamente a traves de continuos ejercicios sobre los asientos y equipos de entrenamiento para que ellos cumplan magnificamente en cualquier momento y en cualquiera situacion dificil los deberes combativos asumidos ante si.
					
					Diciendo que los pilotos deben intensificar el entrenamiento fisico les prometio construir magnificamente en las divisiones de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas la piscina y el gimnasio bajo el techo y las instalaciones combinadas dotadas de las instalaciones deportivas al aire libre.
					
					El Mariscal dirigio el entrenamiento de combate de emboscada aerea de los pilotos de la unidad.
					
					Al mirar en el mirador del puesto de mando los aviones que vuelan en el cielo patrio evaluo  con amplia sonrisa que los pilotos manejan muy bien los aviones y hacen bien los ejercicios.
					
					La tarea principal en los preparativos de combate de las fuerzas aereas esta en que los pilotos adquieran alto nivel de aeronautica, dijo e instruyo investigar constantemente y perfeccionar los autoctonos metodos de batalla aerea y los de combate al estilo guerrillero y realizar cotidiana y habitualmente los ejercicios de vuelo, de modo que todos los pilotos se preparen como combatientes valientes del cielo capaces de cumplir bien sus misiones.
					
					Se reunio con los pilotos participantes en los ejercicios y les felicito por sus exitos.
					
					Paso revista al avion de caza no.302 visto por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y se mostro muy satisfecho de que lo cuidaran bien los pilotos y el personal de servicio tecnico.
					
					Enfatizo que se debe cuidar con responsabilidad los aviones de interes historico presenciados por los Generalisimos para que esas aeronaves puedan volar al frente de los halcones rojos cuando venga el dia de combate en defensa de la patria.
					
					En su recorrido por el dormitorio, el comedor, la cocina y otros lugares de la unidad, atendio con sentimiento paternal las condiciones de vida de los aviadores.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los pilotos de la unidad redoblaran los ejercicios manteniendose en el estado de movilizacion de combate para poder despegar en cualquier momento si lo ordena el Comite Central del PTC y lograran innovaciones colectivas en el entrenamiento politico-militar del ano nuevo, se fotografio junto con ellos y el personal de servicio tecnico.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang y Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica de CDN de RPDC denuncia a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica de CDN de RPDC denuncia a autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los titeres surcoreanos difunden en estos dias el absurdo rumor de que el incidente de hacking de gran envergadura ocurrido en el territorio estadounidense esta relacionado con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC dio el dia 7 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Segun transcendidos, la distribuidora norteamericana de fabricacion de pelicula  SONY Pictures,  recibio el ataque de hacking de alguien.
					
					Segun ello, el ataque fue tan mortal que todo el sistema de la distribuidora se paralizo completamente y el trabajo relacionado esta suspendido generalmente, razon por la cual sufrira el grave dano de cien millones de dolares.
					
					Muy perplejo, EE.UU. moviliza todos los organos de investigacion incluyendo el Buro Federal de Investigacion, la Agencia Central de Inteligencia y el Departamento de Seguridad Nacional para investigarlo con urgencia y recuperar el sistema de la distribuidora.
					
					La RPDC no sabe donde esta situada esta distribuidora ni siente necesidad de conocer sobre el respecto.
					
					Pero, sabe claramente que hace poco, la distribuidora intenta fabricar una malsana pelicula que difama la maxima dignidad de la RPDC e instiga el terror en adhesion a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de la administracion norteamericana.
					
					La RPDC exhorto ya a todo el mundo a levantarse en la justa cooperacion y la antiyanqui para enterrar en la tumba criminal a EE.UU., caudillo de agresion y violacion de DDHH que pisotea a su capricho los derechos universales de la humanidad a vivir de manera pacifica y estable y la soberania de cada pais, y sus fuerzas satelites.
					
					El ataque de hacking arriba mencionado seria la conducta justa de los partidarios y simpatizantes con la RPDC que apoyan el llamamiento de esta.
					
					Lo ridiculo es que en lugar de reflexionar con verguenza su error perpetrado por si mismo EE.UU. investiga el caso apuntando a la RPDC y los titeres surcoreanos acostumbrados a adular a su amo gringo difunden el "rumor de conducta del Norte (de Corea)" relacionandolo ciegamente con la RPDC sin abandonar el vicio de la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Originalmente, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos son delincuentes habituales y reincidentes acostumbrados a acusar sin fundamento alguno a otros si ocurre algo  desgraciado en sus propios territorios.
					
					La situacion de los titeres surcoreanos es tan miserable que se vieron obligados a difundir el "rumor de la conducta del Norte" en cuanto al incidente ocurrido en el territorio de su amo gringo allende el Oceano.
					
					Ellos deben darse clara cuenta de que si siguen lisonjean ciegamente a su amo no  evitaran el castigo terrible en el crisol de la sagrada lucha antiyanqui que se librara en escala mundial.
					
					Tambien EE.UU. debe saber claramente que hay los "defensores de la paz" que dan el golpe a SONY Pictures y por doquier del mundo estan cientos y decenas de millones de partidarios y simpatizantes con la RPDC.
					
					Cuanto mas sigan los actos injustas, se intensificara mas la contramedida de justicia para frustrarlos.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia alborotos de confrontacion fratricida de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia alborotos de confrontacion fratricida de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Al decir que "sera opaca la aprobacion del problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea como tema de discusion" si se substituyen en enero del ano proximo los paises no permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, la banda titere del Sur de Corea se desespera por someter a la consideracion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la "resolucion de DDHH" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, abogando por el "consentimiento" y la "presion y el debate sobre el Norte".
					Esto es un acto criminal y provocativo destinado a empeorar las relaciones intercoreanas al herir al ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, justificar sus maniobras de confrontacion fratricida y aplastarla a toda  costa.
					
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 7 y continua:
					
					La "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC es la descarada farsa politica, inventada por Estados Unidos y la banda titere surcoreana que intentan pisotear con la injusticia la justicia y encubrir con falsedad la verdad para realizar su ambicion de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					El Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, en su reciente declaracion lo rechazo totalmente y publico con solemnidad al interior y exterior que tomara las contramedidas super-intransigentes nunca vistas para frustrar  sin piedad la brutal campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Si embargo, la banda surcoreana trata absurdamente de presentar ante el CS de la ONU la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC desafiando abiertamente a la advertencia de la RPDC.
					
					La verdadera intencion de la banda titere del Sur de Corea es aumentar mas el grado de la demagogia anti-RPDC al presentar ante el CS de la ONU el documento falso lleno de mentiras.
					
					Los alborotos de confrontacion fratricida de la banda surcoreana muestran claramente que ellos son maniacos de enfrentamiento y lacayos fieles a EE.UU.
